caption.p: ( A) The virion of the flavivirus (40–60 nm) is illustrated highlighting the position of the E dimers (E1 and E2), capsid protein and RNA genome ( B) Schematic representation of the Flavivirus structure and genome (11 kb). The position of the 5′-NTR and the 3′-NTR are shown. The Open Reading Frame (ORF) contains the structural viral proteins (C, prM and E) and the non-structural viral proteins (NS1, NS2A, NS2B, NS3, NS4A, NS4B and NS5).
